xx.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_STAFF_: has infiltrated the staff meeting room disguised as a waiter.

xx.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_GUARD_: 47 has infiltrated the guard room disguised as a guard.
xx.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_PENTHO: 47 has infiltrated the penthouse disguised as a staff member.
xx.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_INSIDE: 47 and Grey arrive at a towering structure in the middle of the desert.

47 and Grey arrive spectacularly at a towering structure in the middle of the desert.. Listen to the Director of Hitman 3 talk about the development

47 has arrived by the main road. Listen to the Director of Hitman 3 talk about the development

xx.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_G: 47 has infiltrated the garden behind the mansion disguised as a Garderner.
xx.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_L: 47 has infiltrated the library disguised as Mansion Staff.
xx.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_Z: 47 has infiltrated Zachary Carlisle's bedroom disguised as the Private Investigator.
xx.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_D: 47 has arrived by the main road, after the family gathering.
xx.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_B: 47 has arrived in cover behind the mansion.
47 has arrived in cover behind the mansion, after the family gathering.
xx.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_DEFAULT_DC: Bus Station (Director's Commentary) (note Oli: we need a formalized format for all levels)
xx.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_DEFAULT_DE: Olivia told 47 to meet him here. (Olivias has informed him to meet at a specific location near a bus stop)

xx.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_BIKERLOUNG: 47 infiltrated the biker's hangout area disguised as a biker
xx.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_B1BAR_DESC: 47 has infiltrated the projection bar disguised as a bartender
xx.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_DJBOOTH_DE: 47 has infiltrated the DJ Booth disguised as a DJ
xx.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_CHILLOUT_D: 47 has infiltrated the chill-out area disguised as a staff member
xx.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_CLUBENTRAN: 47 is on the guest list and first in line
xx.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_DEFAULT_DES: 47 has arrived at the train station

xx.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_RESTURANT_D: 47 has infiltrated the restaurant kitchen disguised as a dumpling cook
xx.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_ROOF_DESC: 47 has infiltrated the facility rooftop disguised as a street guard
xx.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_BLOCK_SECUR: 47 has infiltrated the block disguised as a block guard
xx.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_FACILITY_DE: 47 has infiltrated the facility disguised as an analyst
xx.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_STREET_DESC: 47 has arrived on the walkway overlooking the river
xx.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_VIEWP: 47 approaches Diana Burnwood at the viewpoint.
47 approaches Diana Burnwood at the viewpoint. Wich commentary
xx.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_PARKI: 47 has arrived by the parking lot.
xx.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_TASTI: 47 has infiltrated the tasting room disguised as a Waiter.
xx.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_SHRIN: 47 has arrived at the shrine behind Yates' villa.
xx.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_STEEL: 47 has infiltrated the sniper spot on the steel tanks disguised as a Gaucho.
xx.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_GRAPE: 47 has infiltrated the Malbec Field disguised as a Vineyard Worker.
xx.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_ASADO: 47 has infiltrated the party disguised as an Asado Chef.

en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_STAFF_: 47 has expertly managed to infiltrate the Burj Al-Ghazali staff meeting room, cleverly disguised as a waiter.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_ART_IN: 47 has infiltrated the "Accumulus" art installation, donning a disguise that allows him to pass himself off as a technician.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_GUARD_: 47 has infiltrated the guard room, fooling everyone while disguising himself as security.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_PENTHO: 47 has infiltrated the Burj Al-Ghazali penthouse, disguising himself as a member of the staff.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_INSIDE: 47 arrives at the top of a towering structure in the middle of the desert; Grey arrives safely on-site a number of floors below.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_OUTSID: 47 arrives spectacularly on the outside structure of a towering skyscraper in the middle of the Dubai desert.
Game Director Mattias Engström sets the scene as 47 arrives spectacularly on the outside structure of a towering skyscraper in the middle of the Dubai desert.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_D: 47 has arrived at Thornbridge Manor by the main road.
Game Director Mattias Engström sets the scene as 47 arrives at Thornbridge Manor by the main road.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_S: 47 has expertly managed to infiltrate one of the manor's staff rooms disguised as a mansion guard.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_G: 47 has managed to infiltrate the garden area outside the manor house and disguised himself as a gardener.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_L: 47 has found his way to the well-stocked mansion library and starts there disguised as a member of staff.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_Z: 47 has infiltrated the mansion and ended up in Zachary Carlisle's bedroom disguised as the private investigator.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_D: 47 has arrived at Thornbridge Manor by the main road, after the family gathering has started.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_B: 47 has arrived at Thornbridge Manor by way of the water and is in cover near the green house.
47 has arrived at Thornbridge Manor by way of the water and is in cover near the green house, after the family gathering has started.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_DEFAULT_DC: Game Director Mattias Engström sets the scene as 47 arrives at a remote bus stop, where Olivia Hall has informed him to meet her.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_DEFAULT_DE: 47 has arrived at a remote bus stop, where Olivia Hall has informed him to meet her.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_FORESTTOWE: 47 has put on his best boots and is camping out by the foot of a radio tower.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_BIKERLOUNG: 47 has stealthily infiltrated the biker gang's hangout and is currently disguised as a biker.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_B1BAR_DESC: 47 has managed to slip into the "Projection Bar" and is currently disguised as a bartender.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_DJBOOTH_DE: 47 has expertly infiltrated the rave party's DJ Booth disguised as a DJ.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_CHILLOUT_D: 47 has slipped in and infiltrated the chill-out area disguised as a member of the club's crew.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_CLUBENTRAN: 47 has secured a spot on the party's guest list and is first in line.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_DEFAULT_DES: 47 has arrived in Chongqing by way of train and now stands at the Yuzhong train station.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_DEFAULT_DC_: Game Director Mattias Engström sets the scene as 47 arrives in Chongqing by way of train and now stands at the Yuzhong train station.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_RESTURANT_D: 47 has infiltrated a restaurant serving as a front for the ICA data facility and is dressed as a dumpling cook.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_ROOF_DESC: 47 has infiltrated the rooftop premises of the ICA data facility and is cleverly disguised as a street guard.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_BLOCK_SECUR: 47 has managed to infiltrate "the block" and is currently blending in as a block guard.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_FACILITY_DE: 47 has slipped into the ICA data facility and has just finished donning his disguise as an analyst.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_SIGN_DESC: 47 has arrived in Chongqing and is standing on a balcony overlooking the neon-lit streets at nighttime.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_STREET_DESC: 47 has arrived in Chongqing and is relaxing on a walkway overlooking the river.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_VIEWP: 47 approaches the Yates Estate by car and meets up with Diana Burnwood at a viewpoint overlooking the entire winery.
Game Director Mattias Engström sets the scene as 47 approaches Diana Burnwood at the viewpoint.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_PARKI: 47 has arrived at the winery by car and is innocently hanging out in the parking lot amongst guests and security.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_TASTI: 47 has adeptly infiltrated the estate's tasting room where he is now disguised as a waiter.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_SHRIN: 47 has managed to cleverly position himself at the shrine behind Don Yates' villa.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_STEEL: 47 has expertly infiltrated the sniper nest on the steel tanks overlooking the estate where he's currently disguised as a gaucho.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_GRAPE: 47 has manged to infiltrate the Malbec field by disguising himself as a worker.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_ASADO: 47 has infiltrated the estate's public dining area disguised as an asado chef.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_TRAPPED_WOLVERINE_T: 47 has traversed a hostile environment and has entered cover from the howling winds.
47 wakes up on a morgue table inside a pristine looking laboratory environment.
en.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_TRAPPED_WOLVERINE_D: Game Director Mattias Engström sets the scene as 47 finds himself in a mysterious void.
47 finds himself in a mysterious void.

fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_STAFF_: 47 a réussi à s'infiltrer dans la salle de réunion du Burj Al-Ghazali déguisé en serveur.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_ART_IN: 47 a réussi à infiltrer la galerie d'art "Accumulus" en se faisant passer pour un technicien.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_GUARD_: 47 a réussi à s'infiltrer dans la salle des gardes en se déguisant en agent de sécurité.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_PENTHO: 47 a infiltré le penthouse du Burj Al-Ghazali en se déguisant en membre du personnel.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_INSIDE: 47 arrive au sommet d'une structure qui s'élève très haut au milieu du désert, avec Grey déjà sur place, quelques étages au-dessous.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_OUTSID: 47 fait une arrivée spectaculaire sur la structure extérieure d'un gratte-ciel au milieu du désert de Dubaï.
Le directeur du jeu, Mattias Engström, commente la scène où 47 fait une arrivée spectaculaire sur la structure extérieure d'un gratte-ciel au milieu du désert de Dubaï.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_D: 47 est arrivé au manoir Thornbridge par la route principale.
Le directeur du jeu, Mattias Engström, commente la scène où 47 arrive au manoir Thornbridge par la route principale.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_S: 47 a réussi à s'infiltrer dans l'une des salles réservées au personnel en se déguisant en garde du manoir.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_G: 47 a réussi à s'infiltrer dans le jardin du manoir en se déguisant en jardinier.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_L: 47 a réussi à accéder à la bibliothèque bien remplie du manoir, où il commence déguisé en membre du personnel.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_Z: 47 a infiltré le manoir et s'est retrouvé dans la chambre de Zachary Carlisle déguisé en détective privé.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_D: 47 est arrivé au manoir Thornbridge par la route principale après que la réunion de famille a commencé.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_B: 47 est arrivé au manoir Thornbridge par voie maritime et est à couvert près de la serre.
47 est arrivé au manoir Thornbridge par voie maritime et est à couvert près de la serre, après que la réunion de famille a commencé.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_DEFAULT_DC: Mattias Engström, le réalisateur du jeu, plante le décor : 47 arrive près d'un arrêt de bus, où Olivia Hall lui a demandé de la retrouver.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_DEFAULT_DE: 47 arrive près d'un arrêt de bus, où Olivia Hall lui avait dit de la retrouver.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_FORESTTOWE: 47 a enfilé sa plus belle paire de bottes et s'est installé au pied de la tour de communications.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_BIKERLOUNG: 47 a infiltré le repaire du gang de bikers et est maintenant déguisé en biker.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_B1BAR_DESC: 47 a infiltré le bar de projection et est maintenant déguisé en barman.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_DJBOOTH_DE: 47 a infiltré la cabine du DJ de la rave party et est maintenant déguisé en DJ.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_CHILLOUT_D: 47 a infiltré le coin détente déguisé en membre du personnel du club.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_CLUBENTRAN: 47 a réussi à s'incruster sur la liste des invités et est premier dans la file.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_DEFAULT_DES: 47 est arrivé à Chongqing en train et se trouve maintenant dans la gare ferroviaire.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_DEFAULT_DC_: Le directeur du jeu, Mattias Engström, commente la scène où 47 arrive à Chongqing en train et se trouve maintenant dans la gare ferroviaire de Yuzhong.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_RESTURANT_D: 47 a infiltré un restaurant servant de façade au centre de données de l'ICA et est maintenant déguisé en chef.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_ROOF_DESC: 47 a infiltré le toit du centre de données de l'ICA et s'est déguisé en garde de la rue.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_BLOCK_SECUR: 47 s'est infiltré dans le bloc et se fait passer pour un garde du bloc.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_FACILITY_DE: 47 s'est infiltré dans le centre de données de l'ICA et s'est déguisé en analyste.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_SIGN_DESC: 47 est arrivé à Chongqing et se tient sur un balcon surplombant les rues éclairées par les néons de nuit.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_STREET_DESC: 47 est arrivé à Chongqing et se détend sur une passerelle surplombant le fleuve.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_VIEWP: 47 approche du Viñedo Yates en voiture et retrouve Diana Burnwood sur un point d'observation surplombant tout le domaine.
Le directeur du jeu, Mattias Engström, commente la scène où 47 retrouve Diana Burnwood sur le point d'observation.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_PARKI: 47 est arrivé au domaine en voiture et traîne sur le parking parmi les invités et la sécurité.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_TASTI: 47 s'est infiltré dans la salle de dégustation du domaine où il est maintenant déguisé en serveur.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_SHRIN: 47 s'est infiltré au niveau du sanctuaire se trouvant sous la villa des Yates.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_STEEL: 47 s'est infiltré dans le nid de sniper perché sur les cuves en acier surplombant le domaine, où il est déguisé en gaucho.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_GRAPE: 47 s'est infiltré dans les vignes de Malbec en se déguisant en ouvrier.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_ASADO: 47 a infiltré la zone du dîner publique du domaine déguisé en asador.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_TRAPPED_WOLVERINE_T: 47 a traversé un environnement hostile et s'est abrité du vent hurlant.
47 se réveille sur une table funéraire dans un laboratoire immaculé.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_TRAPPED_WOLVERINE_D: Le réalisateur du jeu, Mattias Engström, commente la scène : 47 se retrouve dans un étrange espace vide.
47 se retrouve dans un étrange espace vide.
fr.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_DC_NAME: Commentaire du réalisateur - Introduction de mission

it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_STAFF_: 47 è riuscito a infiltrarsi nella sala riunioni dello staff del Burj Al-Ghazali travestendosi da cameriere.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_ART_IN: 47 si è infiltrato nell'installazione artistica "Accumulus", grazie a un travestimento che gli permette di confondersi tra i tecnici.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_GUARD_: 47 si è infiltrato nella stanza delle guardie, travestendosi da addetto alla sicurezza.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_PENTHO: 47 si è infiltrato nell'attico del Burj Al-Ghazali, travestendosi da membro dello staff.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_INSIDE: 47 arriva in cima una struttura torreggiante nel bel mezzo del deserto. Grey si trova qualche piano più sotto.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_OUTSID: 47 arriva in maniera spettacolare nella struttura esterna di un grattacielo svettante nel bel mezzo del deserto di Dubai.
Il Game Director Mattias Engström illustra la scena: 47 arriva in maniera spettacolare nella struttura esterna di un grattacielo svettante nel bel mezzo del deserto di Dubai.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_D: 47 è arrivato alla tenuta Thornbridge dalla strada principale.
Il Game Director Mattias Engström illustra la scena: 47 arriva alla tenuta Thornbridge dalla strada principale.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_S: 47 è riuscito a infiltrarsi in una delle sale del personale della tenuta, travestendosi da guardia.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_G: 47 è riuscito a infiltrarsi nel giardino antistante la tenuta e si è travestito da giardiniere.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_L: 47 ha trovato la biblioteca ben fornita della villa e inizia la sua missione travestendosi da membro dello staff.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_Z: 47 si è infiltrato nella villa ed è entrato nella camera da letto di Zachary Carlisle, travestito da investigatore privato.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_D: 47 ha raggiunto la tenuta Thornbridge dalla strada principale, dopo l'inizio della riunione di famiglia.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_B: 47 è arrivato alla tenuta Thornbridge dall'acqua e si sta nascondendo vicino alla serra.
47 è arrivato alla tenuta Thornbridge dall'acqua e si sta nascondendo vicino alla serra, dopo che la riunione di famiglia è iniziata.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_DEFAULT_DC: Il Game Director Mattias Engström illustra la scena: 47 raggiunge una fermata del bus isolata, dove Olivia Hall gli ha chiesto di incontrarla.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_DEFAULT_DE: 47 è arrivato a una sperduta fermata dell'autobus, dove Olivia Hall gli ha chiesto di incontrarla.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_FORESTTOWE: 47 ha indossato i suoi stivali migliori e si è accampato alla base della torre radio.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_BIKERLOUNG: 47 si è furtivamente infiltrato nel ritrovo dei biker travestito da biker.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_B1BAR_DESC: 47 è riuscito a infiltrarsi nel bar con proiettore travestito da barista.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_DJBOOTH_DE: 47 si è abilmente infiltrato nella cabina del DJ del rave travestito da DJ.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_CHILLOUT_D: 47 si è infiltrato nell'area relax travestito da un membro del personale del club.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_CLUBENTRAN: 47 si è assicurato un posto sulla lista degli ospiti ed è il primo della fila.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_DEFAULT_DES: 47 è arrivato a Chongqing via treno, e si trova ora alla stazione ferroviaria.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_DEFAULT_DC_: Il Game Director Mattias Engström illustra la scena: 47 è arrivato a Chongqing via treno, e si trova ora alla stazione ferroviaria Yuzhong.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_RESTURANT_D: 47 si è infiltrato in un ristorante che fa da copertura per il centro dati dell'ICA, travestito da cuoco di ravioli.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_ROOF_DESC: 47 si è infiltrato sul tetto del centro dati dell'ICA grazie a un travestimento da guardia esterna.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_BLOCK_SECUR: 47 si è infiltrato nel Blocco e al momento sta passando inosservato nei panni di una guardia del Blocco.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_FACILITY_DE: 47 è riuscito a entrare nel centro dati dell'ICA e ha appena finito di indossare il suo travestimento da analista.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_SIGN_DESC: 47 è arrivato a Chongqing e si trova su un balcone con vista sulla città illuminata dai neon.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_STREET_DESC: 47 è arrivato a Chongqing e si sta rilassando presso un percorso lungo il fiume.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_VIEWP: 47 raggiunge la tenuta di Yates in auto e si incontra con Diana Burnwood presso un belvedere con vista sull'intera cantina.
Il Game Director Mattias Engström illustra la scena: 47 si avvicina a Diana Burnwood sul belvedere.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_PARKI: 47 è arrivato alla cantina in macchina, e si aggira innocentemente nel parcheggio tra ospiti e addetti alla sicurezza.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_TASTI: 47 si è abilmente infiltrato nella sala di degustazione della tenuta, ed è ora travestito da cameriere.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_SHRIN: 47 è riuscito a posizionarsi nel santuario retrostante la villa di Don Yates.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_STEEL: 47 si è abilmente infiltrato nella postazione dei cecchini sopra alle cisterne d'acciaio che danno sulla tenuta, travestito da gaucho.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_GRAPE: 47 è riuscito a infiltrarsi nei campi di Malbec travestendosi da lavoratore.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_ASADO: 47 si è infiltrato nell'area pranzo della tenuta travestito da chef dell'asado.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_TRAPPED_WOLVERINE_T: 47 ha attraversato un ambiente ostile e si è riparato dal vento impetuoso.
47 si sveglia su un tavolo da obitorio, all'interno di un laboratorio immacolato.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_TRAPPED_WOLVERINE_D: Il Game Director Mattias Engström illustra la scena: 47 si trova in un vuoto misterioso.
47 si trova in un vuoto misterioso.
it.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_DC_NAME: Commento del Game Director - Introduzione alla missione

de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_STAFF_: 47 hat als Kellner verkleidet den Besprechungsraum des Personals im Burj Al-Ghazali infiltriert.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_ART_IN: 47 hat als Techniker verkleidet die Kunstinstallation „Accumulus“ infiltriert.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_GUARD_: 47 hat als Wache verkleidet den Wachraum infiltriert.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_PENTHO: 47 hat als Mitglied des Personals verkleidet das Penthouse des Burj Al-Ghazali infiltriert.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_INSIDE: 47 kommt an der Spitze des aufragenden Turms mitten in der Wüste an. Grey ist einige Etagen unter ihm an einem sicheren Ort.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_OUTSID: 47 trifft spektakulär an der Außenwand des turmartig aufragenden Wolkenkratzers mitten in der Wüste von Dubai ein.
Game-Director Mattias Engström holt uns ins Geschehen, als 47 auf spektakuläre Weise an der Außenwand des turmartig aufragenden Wolkenkratzers mitten in der Wüste von Dubai eintrifft.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_D: 47 erreicht Thornbridge Manor über die Hauptstraße.
Game-Director Mattias Engström holt uns ins Geschehen, als 47 Thornbridge Manor über die Hauptstraße erreicht.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_S: 47 hat als Herrenhaus-Wache verkleidet den Personalbereich des Herrenhauses infiltriert.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_G: 47 hat als Gärtner verkleidet den Gartenbereich außerhalb des Herrenhauses infiltriert.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_L: 47 hat als Mitglied des Personals die gut ausgestattete Bibliothek des Herrenhauses infiltriert.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_Z: 47 wurde als Privatdetektiv verkleidet ins Schlafzimmer von Zachary Carlisle gebracht.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_D: 47 erreicht Thornbridge Manor über die Hauptstraße, nachdem die Familienversammlung begonnen hat.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_B: 47 erreicht Thornbridge Manor über den Wasserweg und ist in Deckung hinter dem Gewächshaus.
47 erreicht Thornbridge Manor über den Wasserweg und ist in Deckung hinter dem Gewächshaus, nachdem die Familienversammlung begonnen hat.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_DEFAULT_DC: Game-Director Mattias Engström holt uns ins Geschehen, als 47 an der abgelegenen Bushaltestelle eintrifft, an der Olivia ihn treffen will.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_DEFAULT_DE: 47 trifft an der abgelegenen Bushaltestelle ein, an der Olivia ihn treffen will.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_FORESTTOWE: 47 hat seine besten Stiefel angezogen und sein Lager am Fuß des Funkturms aufgeschlagen.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_BIKERLOUNG: 47 hat als Biker heimlich den Unterschlupf der Bikergang infiltriert.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_B1BAR_DESC: 47 ist als Barkeeper verkleidet in die „Projektorbar“ eingedrungen.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_DJBOOTH_DE: 47 hat als DJ verkleidet die DJ-Kabine der Rave-Party infiltriert.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_CHILLOUT_D: 47 hat als Club-Personal verkleidet die Chill-out-Area infiltriert.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_CLUBENTRAN: 47 hat sich einen Platz auf der Gästeliste gesichert und ist ganz vorn in der Schlange.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_DEFAULT_DES: 47 kommt mit dem Zug in Chongqing an und steht jetzt am Bahnhof.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_DEFAULT_DC_: Game-Director Mattias Engström holt uns ins Geschehen, als 47 mit dem Zug in Chongqing ankommt und am Bahnhof steht.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_RESTURANT_D: 47 hat als Teigtaschenkoch verkleidet ein Restaurant infiltriert, das als Tarnung für die ICA-Dateneinrichtung dient.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_ROOF_DESC: 47 hat als Straßenwache verkleidet den Dachbereich der ICA-Dateneinrichtung infiltriert.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_BLOCK_SECUR: 47 hat als Blockwache verkleidet den „Block“ infiltriert.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_FACILITY_DE: 47 hat als Analyst verkleidet die ICA-Dateneinrichtung infiltriert.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_SIGN_DESC: 47 ist in Chongqing angekommen und steht auf einem Balkon, der die neonbeleuchteten Straßen bei Nacht überblickt.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_STREET_DESC: 47 ist in Chongqing angekommen und steht auf einer Fußgängerbrücke, die den Fluss überblickt.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_VIEWP: 47 nähert sich mit dem Auto dem Yates-Anwesen und trifft dort Diana Burnwood an einem Aussichtspunkt, der den ganzen Weingarten überblickt.
Game-Director Mattias Engström holt uns ins Geschehen, als 47 Diana Burnwood am Aussichtspunkt trifft.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_PARKI: 47 ist mit dem Auto am Weingarten angekommen und mischt sich unter die Gäste und das Sicherheitspersonal auf dem Parkplatz.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_TASTI: 47 hat als Kellner verkleidet den Weinproben-Raum des Anwesens infiltriert.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_SHRIN: 47 ist am Schrein hinter Don Yates’ Villa in Stellung gegangen.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_STEEL: 47 hat als Gaucho verkleidet das Scharfschützennest auf den Stahltanks infiltriert, die das Anwesen überblicken.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_GRAPE: 47 hat als Arbeiter verkleidet das Malbec-Feld infiltriert.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_ASADO: 47 hat als Asado-Koch verkleidet den öffentlichen Speisebereich des Anwesens infiltriert.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_TRAPPED_WOLVERINE_T: 47 hat die gefährliche Umgebung überwunden und Schutz vor dem heulenden Wind gefunden.
47 wacht auf einem Seziertisch in einer sauber aussehenden Laborumgebung auf.
de.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_TRAPPED_WOLVERINE_D: Game-Director Mattias Engström holt uns ins Geschehen, als 47 sich in einer mysteriösen Leere wieder findet.
47 findet sich in einer mysteriösen Leere wieder.

es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_STAFF_: Gracias a un inteligente disfraz de camarero, 47 se ha infiltrado con maestría en la sala de reuniones del personal del Burj Al-Ghazali.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_ART_IN: 47 se ha infiltrado en la instalación de arte «Accumulus» gracias a un disfraz que le permitió hacerse pasar por técnico.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_GUARD_: 47 ha infiltrado en la sala de guardias tras engañar a todo el mundo con su disfraz de vigilante.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_PENTHO: 47 se ha infiltrado en el ático del Burj Al-Ghazali gracias a su disfraz de miembro del personal.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_INSIDE: 47 llega a lo alto de una gran estructura en medio del desierto. Grey llega sano y salvo a una posición varios pisos por debajo.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_GOLDEN_GECKO_OUTSID: 47 llega de manera espectacular a la estructura que hay en el exterior de un gran rascacielos, en medio del desierto de Dubái.
El director del juego, Mattias Engström, prepara la escena de cuando 47 llega de manera espectacular a la estructura que hay en el exterior de un gran rascacielos, en medio del desierto de Dubái.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_D: 47 ha llegado a la mansión Thornbridge por la carretera principal.
El director del juego, Mattias Engström, prepara la escena de cuando 47 llega a la Mansión Thornbridge por la carretera principal.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_S: Gracias a un disfraz de guardia, 47 se ha infiltrado con maestría en una de las salas de personal de la mansión.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_G: 47 ha logrado infiltrarse en el jardín que rodea la mansión y se ha disfrazado de jardinero.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_L: 47 ha encontrado el modo de llegar hasta una biblioteca de la mansión y empieza su misión desde ahí disfrazado de miembro del personal.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_Z: 47 se ha infiltrado en la mansión y ha acabado en la habitación de Zachary Carlisle disfrazado de detective privado.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_D: 47 ha llegado a la mansión Thornbridge por la carretera principal después de que comenzase la reunión familiar.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ANCESTRAL_BULLDOG_B: 47 ha llegado a la mansión Thornbridge por el agua y se ha ocultado cerca del invernadero.
47 ha llegado a la mansión Thornbridge por el agua y se ha ocultado cerca del invernadero. Ha llegado después de que comenzase la reunión familiar.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_DEFAULT_DC: Mattias Engström, el director del juego, nos pone en situación. 47 llega a una parada de autobús remota, donde Olivia Hall le dijo que se reuniese con ella.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_DEFAULT_DE: 47 ha llegado a una parada de autobús remota, donde Olivia Hall le dijo que se reuniese con ella.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_FORESTTOWE: 47 ha acampado al pie de la torre de radio.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_BIKERLOUNG: 47 se ha infiltrado en el garito de la banda de moteros disfrazado de uno de ellos.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_B1BAR_DESC: 47 ha logrado colarse en el «bar de proyecciones» disfrazado de camarero.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_DJBOOTH_DE: 47, disfrazado de DJ, se ha infiltrado con pericia en la cabina del DJ de la fiesta rave.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_CHILLOUT_D: 47 se ha infiltrado en la zona de relax disfrazado de personal del club.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_EDGY_FOX_CLUBENTRAN: 47 se ha asegurado un sitio en la lista de invitados a la fiesta y es el primero en la cola.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_DEFAULT_DES: 47 ha llegado en tren a Chongqing y ahora está en la estación.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_DEFAULT_DC_: El director del juego, Mattias Engström, prepara la escena de cuando 47 llega a Chongqing en tren y se encuentra en la estación de Yuzhong.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_RESTURANT_D: 47 se ha infiltrado en un restaurante que sirve de tapadera a la instalación de datos de la Agencia y va vestido de cocinero de dumplings.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_ROOF_DESC: 47 se ha infiltrado en la azotea de la instalación de datos de la Agencia y va astutamente disfrazado de guardia de la calle.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_BLOCK_SECUR: El agente 47 se ha infiltrado en el «Bloque» y está haciéndose pasar por un guardia del bloque.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_FACILITY_DE: 47 se ha colado en instalación de datos de la Agencia y acaba de terminar de ponerse su disfraz de analista.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_SIGN_DESC: 47 ha llegado a Chongqing y está en un balcón con vistas a las calles iluminadas por los neones de la noche.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_WET_RAT_STREET_DESC: 47 ha llegado a Chongqing y se está relajando en una pasarela con vistas al río.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_VIEWP: 47 se aproxima en coche a la finca de Yates y se encuentra con Diana Burnwood en un mirador que ofrece unas vistas de toda la bodega.
El director del juego, Mattias Engström, prepara la escena de cuando 47 se acerca a Diana Burnwood, en el mirador.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_PARKI: 47 ha llegado a la bodega en coche e, inocentemente, pasa el rato en el aparcamiento entre invitados y miembros de la seguridad.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_TASTI: 47 se ha infiltrado hábilmente en la sala de catas de la hacienda, donde ahora va disfrazado de camarero.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_SHRIN: 47 ha logrado posicionarse, con mucho tino, en el santuario que hay detrás de la villa de Don Yates.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_STEEL: 47 se ha infiltrado con mucha pericia en el puesto de francotirador que hay las cubas de acero con vistas a la hacienda, donde está disfrazado de gaucho.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_GRAPE: 47 ha logrado infiltrarse en la viña de malbec disfrazado de trabajador.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_ELEGANT_LLAMA_ASADO: 47 se ha infiltrado en la zona del comedor público que hay en la hacienda disfrazado de chef del asado.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_TRAPPED_WOLVERINE_T: 47 ha atravesado un entorno hostil y se ha puesto a resguardo de los fuertes vientos.
47 se despierta en una mesa de un depósito de cadáveres, en el interior de un laboratorio de aspecto impoluto.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_TRAPPED_WOLVERINE_D: El director del juego, Mattias Engström, nos pone en situación: 47 se ve de repente en un misterioso vacío.
47 se ve de repente en un misterioso vacío.
es.UI_STARTING_LOCATION_DC_NAME: Comentarios del director: introducción a las misiones
